column6: This is a simple question, we will ask you about your favorite sport. However, to answer the question about your favorite sport, add one hundred to your age and write the result in digits as an answer. Based on the text above, what is your favorite sport?
column8: You want to buy a backpack for everday life (e.g. errands, work, travel) and are looking for a backpack that fits your preferences. The recommender system has shortlisted two backpacks based on price, material and purpose that match your criteria.  Your Task:   	 	Read the descriptions of the recommended backpacks and the explanation below. 	 	 	Choose which option you prefer. 	 	 	After you choose, you will answer a few brief follow-up questions about your decision. 	   Please imagine these recommendations as if you were genuinely shopping for a backpack. You won't be able to go back after choosing.     Backpack A         Star Rating: ★★★★☆ (4.5)  Price: $65  Color: Black  Style & Capacity:– Sleek, minimalistic design  – Medium capacity (fits a 15" laptop)   – Few external pockets  Material & Brand:– Produced with 100% Nylon   – Well-known urban fashion label     Backpack B         Star Rating: ★★★★☆ (4.5)  Price: $68  Color: Black  Style & Capacity:– Simple modern design   – Medium capacity (fits a 15" laptop)   – Few external pockets  Material & Brand:– Produced with 75% recycled fabrics  – Eco-friendly brand with carbon offset programs for shipping       Explanation: We recommend Backpack B because by choosing it, you’re actively shrinking your carbon footprint and championing more responsible production. This backpack is your personal contribution to climate action. Take pride in traveling lighter on the planet, one backpack at a time!  Which backpack do you prefer to buy:
